verses.name: Job 40:1
verses.text: Respondens autem Dominus Job de turbine, dixit :

verses.name: Job 40:2
verses.text: Accinge sicut vir lumbos tuos :  interrogabo te, et indica mihi.

verses.name: Job 40:3
verses.text: Numquid irritum facies judicium meum,  et condemnabis me, ut tu justificeris ?

verses.name: Job 40:4
verses.text: Et si habes brachium sicut Deus ?  et si voce simili tonas ?

verses.name: Job 40:5
verses.text: Circumda tibi decorem, et in sublime erigere,  et esto gloriosus, et speciosis induere vestibus.

verses.name: Job 40:6
verses.text: Disperge superbos in furore tuo,  et respiciens omnem arrogantem humilia.

verses.name: Job 40:7
verses.text: Respice cunctos superbos, et confunde eos,  et contere impios in loco suo.

verses.name: Job 40:8
verses.text: Absconde eos in pulvere simul,  et facies eorum demerge in foveam.

verses.name: Job 40:9
verses.text: Et ego confitebor  quod salvare te possit dextera tua.

verses.name: Job 40:10
verses.text: Ecce behemoth quem feci tecum,  fœnum quasi bos comedet.

verses.name: Job 40:11
verses.text: Fortitudo ejus in lumbis ejus,  et virtus illius in umbilico ventris ejus.

verses.name: Job 40:12
verses.text: Stringit caudam suam quasi cedrum ;  nervi testiculorum ejus perplexi sunt.

verses.name: Job 40:13
verses.text: Ossa ejus velut fistulæ æris ;  cartilago illius quasi laminæ ferreæ.

verses.name: Job 40:14
verses.text: Ipse est principium viarum Dei :  qui fecit eum applicabit gladium ejus.

verses.name: Job 40:15
verses.text: Huic montes herbas ferunt :  omnes bestiæ agri ludent ibi.

verses.name: Job 40:16
verses.text: Sub umbra dormit in secreto calami,  et in locis humentibus.

verses.name: Job 40:17
verses.text: Protegunt umbræ umbram ejus :  circumdabunt eum salices torrentis.

verses.name: Job 40:18
verses.text: Ecce absorbebit fluvium, et non mirabitur,  et habet fiduciam quod influat Jordanis in os ejus.

verses.name: Job 40:19
verses.text: In oculis ejus quasi hamo capiet eum,  et in sudibus perforabit nares ejus.

verses.name: Job 40:20
verses.text: An extrahere poteris Leviathan hamo,  et fune ligabis linguam ejus ?

verses.name: Job 40:21
verses.text: Numquid pones circulum in naribus ejus,  aut armilla perforabis maxillam ejus ?

verses.name: Job 40:22
verses.text: Numquid multiplicabit ad te preces,  aut loquetur tibi mollia ?

verses.name: Job 40:23
verses.text: Numquid feriet tecum pactum,  et accipies eum servum sempiternum ?

verses.name: Job 40:24
verses.text: Numquid illudes ei quasi avi,  aut ligabis eum ancillis tuis ?

verses.name: Job 40:25
verses.text: Concident eum amici ?  divident illum negotiatores ?

verses.name: Job 40:26
verses.text: Numquid implebis sagenas pelle ejus,  et gurgustium piscium capite illius ?

verses.name: Job 40:27
verses.text: Pone super eum manum tuam :  memento belli, nec ultra addas loqui.

verses.name: Job 40:28
verses.text: Ecce spes ejus frustrabitur eum,  et videntibus cunctis præcipitabitur.
